Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 4 Vipākattika » 4.3 Paccayavāra » 4.3.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 4.3.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Nahetuduka
Vipākattika
Paccayavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Nahetuduka
79.
2237Nahetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dvādasa, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi…pe…  nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke cattāri, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne cattāri, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
2238(Yathā kusalattike paccanīyagaṇanā, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2239Paccanīyaṃ.
<< Suddhaup4.3.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya >>
